channel.title: Website on Project Azar
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Project Azar

item.title: Migrating to Github
item.description: Oh. You’re back. It’s been a while, and let me tell you, the last few months were a hoot. Three depositions, one mediation, thousands of emails, and I bought a house. But that’s not why you’re here. You’re here for some technical nonsense. “Lifetime” Hosting When I first started this website, I used a host called iBrave. Sometime last year, I saw a great deal: a lifetime of hosting service for $30, with unlimited bandwidth, and basic features like one-click solutions for platforms like WordPress.
